backend/main.mo: Motoko actor implementing an in-memory record store keyed by text, with functions to add records, query individual records, list all records, and report size. Includes record comparison logic and traps on duplicate or missing keys.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting a completed change that adds a required "INVOICE NUMBER" column to shared Excel templates, including affected files, components, tests, and confidence level.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Generated overview file mapping frontend source paths to brief descriptions of their responsibilities across reconciliation, UI components, utilities, and configuration.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS setup defining light and dark theme design tokens, color variables, and base styles for the application UI.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the frontend application that mounts the React app and loads the main TypeScript module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component providing the overall layout, header/footer, and tab-based navigation between upload/configuration and results views.
frontend/src/features/reconcile/configVa: Provides validation logic for reconciliation configuration, ensuring key columns and compare columns are selected for all sheets.
frontend/src/features/reconcile/excelPar: Parses Excel files using XLSX, extracting sheet names, headers, and normalized row data, and exposes helpers to read available sheet names.
frontend/src/features/reconcile/exportXl: Exports reconciliation results into a formatted Excel workbook with a summary section and detailed comparison rows.
frontend/src/features/reconcile/fileVali: Validates uploaded Excel files for correct file type, expected sheet name, and required headers based on template specifications.
frontend/src/features/reconcile/normaliz: Utility functions to normalize cell values and build composite keys from selected columns.
frontend/src/features/reconcile/PreviewT: Reusable component that displays a scrollable preview of parsed Excel sheet data, showing headers and the first N rows with empty-cell indicators.
frontend/src/features/reconcile/Reconcil: Configuration UI for selecting key columns per sheet and shared comparison columns, driven by controlled state passed from parent components.
frontend/src/features/reconcile/reconcil: Implements the core reconciliation algorithm that compares rows across three sheets, detects matches, mismatches, missing records, duplicates, and produces summary statistics.
frontend/src/features/reconcile/ResultsT: Results view that summarizes reconciliation outcomes, supports filtering and searching rows, shows detailed dialogs, and exports results to Excel.
frontend/src/features/reconcile/template: Defines template specifications for Sheets A, B, and C, including expected sheet names, required headers, and downloadable template metadata.
frontend/src/features/reconcile/types.ts: Contains shared TypeScript types for parsed sheets, reconciliation configuration, result rows, statuses, and overall reconciliation results.
frontend/src/features/reconcile/UploadTa: React component that handles uploading, validating, parsing, previewing, and reconciling three Excel files (A/B/C), manages reconciliation configuration, and triggers reconciliation or template downloads.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom React hook that creates and caches a backend actor based on the current Internet Identity, and refreshes dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Defines a React context, provider, and hook to manage Internet Identity authentication using @dfinity/auth-client, including login/logout, persisted identity loading, and detailed login status flags.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS entry defining base styles and extensive CSS variables for a teal/emerald light and dark theme, including colors, charts, and radius tokens.
frontend/src/lib/baseUrl.ts: Utility to construct base-path-aware URLs for static assets using Vite’s BASE_URL, handling subpath deployments safely.
frontend/src/lib/generateTemplates.ts: Generates and downloads Excel (.xlsx) template files using SheetJS based on predefined template specs, ensuring correct headers and sheet names.
frontend/src/lib/xlsx.ts: Type-safe wrapper and lazy loader for the SheetJS XLSX library loaded via CDN, exposing helpers to load, access, read, and write Excel workbooks.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app, wiring up React Query and the InternetIdentityProvider, and imports global styles.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration enabling dark mode, shadcn/ui-compatible design tokens, custom fonts, colors via CSS variables, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Machine-readable snapshot of the project’s current state, summarizing architecture, implemented features, and pending feature requests for the ICP dapp.
